snippet.title: Merchant of the Skies - Gameplay Trailer (Early Access)
snippet.description:
As Merchant of the Skies is nearing it's early access launch, we are happy to present you with the latest gameplay trailer!

In this trader simulator / rpg with base-building elements, start as a small merchant on a flying ship and work your way up to create a trade empire!

Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1040070/Merchant_of_the_Skies/

Releasing in Early Access at July 30, 2019. Windows/OSX/Linux
